LEAD STAFF
Matthew Swezey
Owner/Executive Chef
Jesse Edmunds
Owner
Logan Hill
Front of House Manager
Ana Boesel
Bar Program Manager
Our Beverage Program focuses on low intervention natural wines, draft cocktails, local beer, and a variety of house-made low and zero ABV beverages.
Black Radish is proud to be a part of Seven Hills Hospitality Group which includes
Liberty Bar
,
The Hawthorn Bistro & Bakery
,
Bar 1903
,
Rae’s
, and
LINK
. We look forward to bringing a new dining experience to Tallahassee!
Innovating Vegetable Focused Cuisine in Tallahassee.
A vegetable focused restaurant that specializes in hyper-seasonal shareable vegetable dishes, handmade pastas, and natural wines. While the restaurant is mostly vegetarian & vegan, we also have offerings that include seafood and meat Our philosophy is to focus on ingredient driven dishes, and to let the amazing locally sourced produce and offerings shine.
RECENT PRESS
Tallahassee Democrat
Feature
Tallahassee Magazine
Feature
Tallahassee Foodies
Feature - “Secret Dinner”
Tallahassee Table

EVENTS & CATERING
At Seven Hills Events and Catering, we are dedicated to transforming your special moments into unforgettable experiences. Our mission is to provide exceptional catering and event planning services—both on-premise restaurant rentals and off-premise event—that combine culinary excellence with meticulous attention to detail. We offer custom menu selections tailored to your vision, the choice of menu items from any of our Seven Hills restaurants, and a variety of bar program offerings to complement your event. With a commitment to quality, sustainability, and outstanding service, we aim to exceed every expectation.
For inquiries about event & catering services, or full restaurant rentals, please fill out the questionnaire below and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
Questionnaire.
Fill out the info and we will be in touch shortly!
